mean_cn: v.猜测，推测，认为（读作/sərˈmaɪz/）；  n.推测，猜度（读作/ˈsɜrˌmaɪz/）
mean_en: to form an opinion about something without definitely knowing the truth
sentence: What might my crazy ex-boyfriend be doing now? I can\u0027t even surmise.
sentence_trans: 我那疯狂的前男友现在在干什么？我甚至不能猜测。
word_etyma: sur在下面 ＋ mise送，放出 → 在下面说出的话 → surmise猜测
